requirements.description: Must have at least 2 cards in deck

tips: Always run 4 copies in competitive decks
Use freely throughout the game for card advantage
One of the best turn 1 plays
Play Bill before Professor Oak to see more cards total
Late game, count your deck before Bill to avoid decking out
Bill is often correct to play on any turn where you can play it

rulings.ruling: Simply draw 2 cards from your deck
You must have at least 2 cards remaining in your deck to play Bill
If you have exactly 1 card in your deck, you cannot play Bill
No other conditions, costs, or requirements to play this card
Bill counts as playing a Trainer card for any effects that track Trainer usage
One of the simplest and most straightforward cards in the game
